add_delete_new_network_features.js

addFeature(feature)

onclick function for the add feature buttons in the GUI switches leaflet map mode to draw and makes sure we place down the correct marker type

Arguments:

  • feature (string) – name of the network feature type we want to create

prepareFeatureDelete(featureName, featureLists)

if you try to delete a bus, the function tries to find all connected features (lines, ext_grids, trafos) and marks them as about to be deleted as well

Arguments:

  • featureName (string) – name of the feature type to delete

  • featureLists (list) – contains feature names of all features that may be connected to the deletable feature

deleteConnectedFeatures()

removes all features attached to a deletable bus from the map, the network object and the feature list gui

deleteFeature(featureName)

delete function used for features that do not have other features attached to them aka lines, trafos, ext_grids

Arguments:

  • featureName (string) – key for the type of the feature we want to delete
